titles.title: Air Cargo Fire and Rescue Enhancement Act
To amend section 44706 of title 49, United States Code, to require operating certificates for airports at which large cargo operations are conducted.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary: 10/20/2005--Introduced. Air Cargo Fire and Rescue Enhancement Act - Amends federal transportation law to require the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to issue an airport operating certificate to a person desiring to operate an airport that serves an air carrier operating aircraft that provide all cargo air transportation and have a maximum certificated gross take-off weight of 100,000 pounds or greater.
